I wasn’t happy and have many regrets from all of this, but at that point I just went along with it. I was new and figured it was normal. :(

I remember nicely asking him to stop because I hadn’t don’t that and it hurt but he slammed my face down into the bed and said things like “I’m old enough to be your daddy, do what I say or else”. I just took it and cried the whole time. 

After there was an awkward tension, like we both knew what just happened. He offered me a joint and scarily I took it. He then went on naming over a dozen directors, saying “if I did things right he could get me more work”. I then said I felt sick, went to my car and cried for over an hour. 

I saw him at an industry party a few weeks later, he grabbed my waist and said something about owning me so I shoved him off me. It was a pretty big scene. So, one night my sister, Jared, Jared's friend and myself were hanging out at the docks drinking some cheap beer. My sister wasn't feeling well and just wanted to go home. So we all came back to our house and dropped her off. Jared, his friend and me were still very much awake and having a great time. So, the 3 of us got in Jared's car and went to his house 45 minutes away to continue on with the great time! I thought nothing of it.(just a side note... his friend was the DD) At this point, we'd all hung out many times. I felt like I was just hanging out with my brother and his best friend.


We get to Jared's house, after the long drive, it's about 2 or 3 am and Jared's friend went straight upstairs to crash for the night. We all looked pretty sleepy so I grabbed a blanket and was ready to sleep on the couch. Jared goes off to his room which is right off of where I am in the living room and within a few seconds he calls me into his room. I prance in there, thinking he's going to show me some silly sticker or picture or even maybe something for my sister, but he looks at me up and down, comes in really close (as I'm backing up the whole time!) and he grabs my face and tries to kiss me. I couldn't imagine anything creepier, not just because he's my sister's boyfriend but because I literally thought of him as my brother. I'd have the exact same reaction as if my own "real" brother were trying to make a move on me. I yelled "What the \\\*bleep\\\* ARE YOU DOING!?" and didn't let him come anywhere near my face. I backed out into the living room, still facing him as he keeps moving towards me like a creep. He just keeps pleading, "Don't tell you sister! Please!" Me, just wanting him to stop, I said "Fine, I won't say anything, just get to bed and leave me alone, Go to bed!" Well, he wouldn't go to bed and wouldn't stop. Things went from me thinking he's just a tipsy idiot to feeling absolutely terrified. He also moved on from saying "I just want to know what it's like to kiss you" to saying "I just want to "sleep" with you, just once! She won't know!" when it happened I was 14, a freshman in high school. It was January so it would start getting dark at like, 5. I had decided to stay after school to catch up with some friends who I hadn't seen for a while because they were in an extracurricular activity that took up all their time. The plan was I'd spend time with them then they'd take me home after rehearsal at 9, but when they were kind of just ignoring me the whole time which kinda hurt my feelings. So even though it was around 4:30 I told them I was going to go home because I suddenly didn't feel well. Nothing had ever happened to me when it was dark. Hell, when I was a kid id play with the other neighborhood kids when it was night time. I was never scared of being out when it was dark. 

I started walking away from the school with my earbuds in listening to music. The sidewalk was right next to a cemetery (my high school was literally across the street from a cemetery).After a minute I felt a tap on my shoulder. I turned around and saw this tall man who id never seen before. Before I could say anything he looked at his hand, so I looked and saw he had a knife. It wasn't like, a kitchen knife or anything but it was big enough that I was immediately scared. He said "don't scream, and don't run. Don't do anything to make me hurt you. You understand?" I just shook my head yes because I was scared to even speak. He put his arm around my shoulder and started walking me into the cemetery.

We were just walking for so long. I didn't realize how big it was, I had never been in there before. I was trying to decide if I should try to run, if I should say something. Wondering why he wasn't saying anything. All I was thinking was, I can't believe I'm getting robbed. 14year old me couldn't even fathom the thought that someone would ever rape me. We finally got to a thick, tall trees. He told me to stand in front of it so I did. He then got in my personal space, almost right in my face. He told me to take off my backpack and jacket. Which I had already assumed he would take. I was just nervous about him killing me afterwards. So I was shocked when he told me to take off my clothes. I was so taken back that the first words I nervously said were "but I'll be cold". I still have no idea why I said it. He immediately smacked me in the face and told me to take them off, more aggressively this time. I don't know if he was heavy handed or if it was because of the cold, but the smack stung so much more than I expected that I just did it. 

I did and I was shaking and had my arms crossed trying to keep myself warm. He then started trying to kiss me. I kept moving my head away from him. Squirming even though he had me trapped. He smacked me again even harder and told me to stop. So I did. I let him kiss me and it was awful. I still have trouble kissing, even with my fiance now. He started grinding up against my body. I didn't know why he was doing it, I just felt gross about it. After what felt like way too long he pulled me by the back of my head and pushed me to the ground. I started just randomly flailing and kicking and punching and accidentally hit him in the face. He REALLY didn't like that. He got me onto my back and smacked my face 5 times. I didn't mind him, because I'm an introvert too, but he's a bit more extreme. Pretty sure he's on the autism spectrum somewhere.

Larry told me that Devin "feels like there's a woman inside of him" and he "tries to achieve a anime girl voice". Alright, whatever floats your boat.

Passages:
I walked for like 20 minutes until eventually I see a car slow down as it passed me, and make a U turn. It was a guy in maybe his 50s, kinda nerdy looking guy, chubby with glasses. At the time, he didn't look or act creepy. He gave me a ride, kept telling me how dangerous it was for a young girl like me to be alone out here. Honestly, his concern is what put me at ease. It had gotten dark by this point, I had been an idiot thinking I'd have gotten to that next town on foot anytime soon. Eventually he sees some car sitting on the other side of the highway and he does a U turn to "see if anybody needs help." He kept talking alot at that point, I think to distract me.


When he pulled over, instead of getting out, he turned towards me suddenly and swung his arm and punched me in stomach... really fucking hard. I doubled over in the worst pain I'd ever felt. I tried reaching for the door handle, but felt his hand grab me by my hair. I think he slammed my head against the dash. Til this day, I still don't really remember much at all about this part. I guess I passed out or got knocked out.


I remember waking up with something wet and warm on my face, and my vision was blurry. I was crazy disoriented. It felt like I was upside down or something. I felt myself being bounced up and down. I threw up and it went the wrong direction, up my nose and face. I tried to reach and wipe it off, but I couldn't move my arms. My vision started clearing up just as the world went spinning up and down and I felt my ass and shoulder slam down on a hard floor. It was really dark. I started screaming but felt something with a weird texture shoved in my mouth. I started kicking my feet. I felt pain in my gut again and then I guess I passed out again.


Eventually I woke up slowly. There was some kind of dim light. I was in what looked like a basement. I could see my shoes and my clothes were laying neatly folded in the corner. I tried to move and everything hurt. My head, stomach, shoulders, wrists, my jaw, even the corners of my mouth... all felt like on fire. I tried talking but my mouth felt extremely full, but open wide too? I couldn't close my mouth. I tasted rubber, and the leftover taste of when I'd thrown up. I looked down and realized I was naked. I started freaking out. Eventually I figured out my wrists and ankles were tied up. I started crying and shaking uncontrollably. I couldn't think straight at all. I knew I was going to die. That guy that seemed so nice and picked me up had taken me somewhere to kill me.


I don't know how long I was alone, but eventually the same guy came into the basement. He looked emotionless. I felt extremely weak and needing to throw up. I was cold and shaking. I started to dry heave. He grabbed my hair and I felt him doing something behind my head, then the corners of my mouth started burning and something was pulled out of my mouth. I coughed up some kind of rag that had been stuffed back in my mouth. I tried to throw up but nothing came out. Just dry heaving and I was crying uncontrollably. Finally he just calmly said "stop it". I didn't want to look at him. I was horrified.

After a moment of hesitance, I had agreed. Which, leads me to believe that the following is my fault. I could have, and should have, said no. I should have just left then and there, should've made up some excuse about my roommate needing me.

But I didn't.

So I went back with him to his dorm. It was a messy thing, but that made sense considering that he was a college boy bunking with another guy. The longer I was in his dorm, the more that sinking feeling of earlier returned. I had mace. It was hanging on my purse. Not once did I use it. He left to check the mail, and left the front door open a crack. I could've left then. I should've. But I didn't.

Then he stood and closed and locked his bedroom door. I felt my heart drop to my stomach and I scooted to the edge of the bed even more, as if to stand; but he crossed the room in just a step and a half. I feel as though here I should note that he was far taller than me. I barely had time to register that he was in front of me when he suddenly shoved me backwards, a sharp breathe of exhale escaping me. Not quite a gasp, but more than just a simple breath. I remember trying to catch myself, and I remember the pain of my hair clip digging into my scalp.

I remember his weight on top of me, crushing. And then he collided his lips with mine, and it was painful, as he bit my bottom lip and pulled; his hands having long since pinned mine to the bed.

I'm not sure how long really he was on top of me, but he finally rolled off, onto the side of me. It took me a moment to push myself back up, my mouth stinging and my lips throbbing. As soon as I did sit back up, he did the same, and wasted no time in tugging at my belt and belt loops like a child, pouting.

I didn't know what else to do. He was taller, clearly stronger. So I stood, and silently, with my hands shaking a little, unbuckled my belt. As soon as I had it unbuckled, he pulled it free from my pants, and nodded to the buttons on my pants themselves. I remember swallowing, and bending down to take off my sandals. As soon as I had done so, he had whacked my own belt against my ass, and I don't think I've ever straightened so fast.

He rose to take everything else off of me once my sandals were off. I felt naked in more ways than one. He stared at me for a moment, before shoving me backwards again, taking off his own clothes as he stared down at me.

Once he was undressed, once again his weight was on top of me. I wanted to cry. Once again he had my hands pinned.

When he was finally done, I could barely stand. I got out of there as fast as I could; saying whatever he wanted to hear so I could do so unhibited.

We could talk for hours, about books, about religion and philosophy, about the most interesting or the most mundane things.

I missed him terribly when he was out of town for just a few weeks. When he returned my joy was immense. He picked me up and we went to his place. He lit up a joined and we got into one of our long winding discussions.

Passages: I feel like I'm a magnet for sexual abuse. At least I use to feel that way. Now that I'm an adult, I'm antisocial, I don't have many friends and I have a lot of mental health issues. This story is not for the faint of heart, I'm not seeking attention, this is an attempt of therapy. When I was little some of my first memories are of being molested by one of my grandpa's friends. I was maybe 4. I just remember him touching me inappropriately. My grandpa ended up looking under the table and seeing what was happening. He beat the living shit out of him and dragged him off the property. I never saw that man again. When I was around 10 or so my brother was taken away from us by his father. His father eventually let me come visit him after months of not seeing him. It was fine as first, until one night when my brother was asleep he made me play truth or dare. He dared me to kiss him. I wasn't at all comfortable with the idea. He said okay and said it was time to just go to bed since I was no fun and couldn't play along. I woke up to him covering my mouth with his hand and pulling my clothes off. I struggled and fought as much as I could. I eventually got tired, while he laughed he raped me. When he was done he said if I ever wanted to see my little brother again I would never say anything about it. He said he would make sure no one believed me. The next day I tried sleeping in the same room as my brother. He came in while my brother was asleep and told me to suck his dick. I told him that I didn't want too. He pulled out a gun and said he would kill my brother if I did not. I cried and did as he asked. When I eventually went home I said nothing to anyone. He had my brother. I didn't know what to do. A few months later I ended up in foster care. Me and my youngest brother were together and my case worker eventually gained my trust. I talked to him about it. My hope was is that they could go get him and he could be with me too. So I would have both my brothers. But being young and knowing how nothing worked, there was no proof. They informed my brothers dad of what I was claiming and I never saw him again until he was an adult. I was in foster care for awhile. I was able to see how the other half lived. Foster parents had their own children, that they loved in a way I never experienced. My mother had chosen meth above all else. We had lived in so many houses, most without windows and doors, then once she scraped all the copper from that house we were off to the next. I took care of my brothers, I was their mom. I was my own mom. So seeing these kids loved and cared for grew in me a new hatred for my own mother. Anyways, eventually my grandmother took me and my youngest brother in, out of foster care, the older I got the less people wanted me to stay in their homes. I went back to living a shitty life, where no one cared about me. My grandma got tired of me, whether it was me writing lyrics on my bedroom walls, self mutilating myself to feel anything at all. Whatever the reason she had my mom come pick me up with a backpack of my things and she told me we were going on a trip. I was just starting high school at this point. We drove for hours. We came to this trailer park hours away from anyone I knew. She stops the truck and tells me I am going to be staying with my biological father. Someone I had only met once, right after he got out of prison for armed robbery. Now at this point, I wasnt surprised. I knew I wasn't wanted no matter where I went. My grandma had killed every pet I tried to have, and between her and my mother I had no self esteem to speak of. So My mother left with a huge bag of meth and I was left standing in front of a small RV with 3 people living inside. At first it was okay. I had family who took an interest in me. They were happy to meet me. I thought maybe it wouldn't be so bad. My dad and his girlfriend fought all the time. He ended up being abusive towards her. He was about 30 and she was around 60. She ended up going to the hospital for a long time. She had to have a quadruple bypass surgery on her heart. So she was gone for awhile. During this time my dad started acting weird towards me. Asking me if I had been having sex. Which I was 15 and considering my history it was the last thing I was ever interested in. I shrugged it off figured maybe he was trying to figure out how to be a dad. I use to sleep on the floor right next to the couch in the RV. He slept on the couch. My great uncle slept on the other side of the RV which was the only actual bed in the whole thing. He started pulling my covers off. I slept in normal clothes. After a few days of him pulling my covers off he said he wanted to set up a tent and sleep out there. That he was depressed his girlfriend was still in the hospital and wanted to do something fun so I went along with it. We stayed out in the tent that night. His questions got weirder. I already knew where it was going but I was in denial. That night my father raped me. I didn't cry, I didn't scream, I didn't feel. My life was over. He eventually moved me out to a shed, that had a small window, not big enough to fit through. One door that locked on the outside. His girlfriend came back after she recovered and everything was fine for a few days. He would lock me in the shed and come in at night and rape me. He would anal rape me. I had been to the hospital with him right by my side for torn assholes and my throat would be swollen and black from bruising. It became a routine. I would roll his cigarettes every morning, make his coffee and his breakfast. And stay locked in the shed until his night visits. One night while he was visiting me, his girlfriend came in and freaked the fuck out. His immediately got up and kicked her so hard in the chest. She went flying, she hit the ground and was knocked out. He locked me back in and left. I don't know what he said to her, what was done, but the next day she left. Before she left she told me she was so sorry. I never saw her again. At this point I'm sure you are wondering why I didn't run. Why I didn't say anything to anyone. He used to make me fight him in the front yard. He beat my ass everyday. I'd black out, from the punches, from my muscles screaming that they were tired. He would threaten me daily. He beat me while he raped me. I have never been so scared of someone as I was him. His sister, my aunt eventually told me her jaw was metal from him beating her face in. He raped and beat his own brother. He did coke and drank daily. One night he said he was going to a party and locked me in the shed as usual. He told me to be ready to roll his cigarettes and get his bed together for when he got back. At this point he started sleeping in the shed with me. He had a computer in the shed, it was that aol shit. So when he wasn't around I would text old friends and see if they would come get me. They never helped. Well anyways, 2am roles around and he is still not back and I'm so tired. I eventually fall asleep, which is a big no no. That night he broke both my legs with a baseball bat. He laughed about it and passed out while I layed on the floor crying with bone sticking out of my leg. He left the door open though. Which now had an inside lock since he started sleeping in there. I pulled myself 15 feet or so to the RV and called my other uncle to come take me to the hospital. I didn't tell a soul what happened. I lied to the hospital, I lied to everyone. He would kill me. No matter where I went he would kill me. This went on for years. On my 17th birthday he put a machete to my throat,he cut my face, my neck and punched me until I was gone. I guess he was scared that I was getting older, I was getting better at fighting him. I was getting better at taking punches. He stopped letting me go to doctor's visits, I ended up getting pregnant. With that he ended up moving me out to the middle of nowhere, so no one would see it. This is where I started my plans. I promised him the world. I promised I would never leave. When I felt like he believed me, I talked to him about letting me finish school. Letting me go stay in my shed at my great uncles and finish school. I didn't have much left anyways. He agreed, I was so fucking surprised when he agreed. I went to school, I started skipping and met a guy. I didn't tell this guy I was pregnant. When we got close and I thought he was in love with me I told him my dad beat me and I needed to get out. I had nowhere to go. Do I feel bad I used this guy? Yes. I don't regret it though. He and a friend of his drove me to my shed. And I started getting my shit. My great uncle saw this and called my dad immediately. My dad showed up before I left. He beat my face in with a metal coffee can until my "boyfriend" and his friend threatened him at knife point, they dragged me to their car and took off. We ended up living with his friends aunt for awhile. My dad sent the cops there multiple times for a welfare check up. They couldn't make me go back though. My mom called me and told me she was coming for me and going to take me back to him. Even after I told her everything. I was about to be 18 there was nothing they could do. I had prayed to God everyday and nothing changed. Well after all the phone calls and people coming and vandalizing this woman's property the cops showed up again for yet another welfare check. I told them everything. I was still covered in bruises, scars and I was pregnant to boot. It took years for him to actually go to jail. Court date after court date, lie detector tests blood tests on him and the baby. The evidence was too much. On our last court date my brothers father showed up and testified against me saying this was not the first time I tried to falsely accuse someone of rape. I mean the fucking balls on this guy. I wanted to kill him. I wanted to kill my father. I had fantasized about it everyday for years. The last thing he screamed at me before they hauled him off was that he would come for me and the baby. That I was his and his alone. I stayed in the same town for awhile and was terrorized by his friends and my family. I ended up giving the baby up for adoption. I ended up moving as far away as possible. Now I'm an adult and it's been nine years. I'm still plagued with nightmares, I'm depressed, I have anxiety, ptsd, DID and I'm developing schizophrenia. I've tried to kill myself on several occasions. Ending up in getting my stomach pumped, many hospital visits, many therapists. I still always ask myself when will I be okay. I guess I'm getting there. I hope I'm getting there. No matter what happens in life fight for yourself, fight for your future. Your being should be your number one priority. I had to do things I never want to do again. I had to pretend to love someone when I visualized killing them everyday. I had no one to help me but myself. I no longer believe in God. I just am. I just try to find happiness where I can. Idk what else to say. But for those who read my story, don't pity me. Just know that it'll be okay, maybe not now, or soon but it will be, but you have to fight for it and want it and take action, even if it's a neverending cycle, it will be okay.
